name: .DMKIT File Extension
summary: Learn about .DMKIT files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a DMKIT file in Image-Line FL Studio (Windows, Mac) with the Drumaxx plug-in installed. To do so:
Install Drumaxx in FL Studio (using the Add plug-in to Channel rack button).
Select Drumaxx from FL Studio's Channel rack.
Select the Load button that appears next to the Drumaxx logo.
Browse to and select your DMKIT file.
The drum pads your DMKIT file contains will appear in Drumaxx.
